god knws wat d hell was i complain abt few weeks back

Santa
:)

Hi 20 40,
Thank you for the encode/upload.

Has anyone seen this movie yet? Please tell me how it is. Cant find much info as it is not there on imdb too.

Downloading this for my oldest daughter, who took Wing Chun from 2 different instructors (unofficially) for a couple of years.  She will appreciate it.  (I did, in fact, read your reply--just didn't think you were serious, sorry.  Won't doubt you again. ;)  )

@zakimar: Not dubbed one. Since I have no clue about differences between Chinese dialects - I have left ORIGINAL one - watching the actors with certain lip-sync. If they spoke Cantonese - it's Cantonese - or vice-versa. Further than that, I would not go and frankly - I couldn't care less.

This is not an action/martial arts film - it is a comedy.

Also the language is mandarin.
i dont know how you got hold of this but thanks a lot! A/V - 10/10
